title: 2003–04 Heart of Midlothian F.C. season
text: The 2003–04 season was the <a href="List%20of%20Heart%20of%20Midlothian%20F.C.%20seasons">107th season</a> of competitive <a href="association%20football">football</a> by <a href="Heart%20of%20Midlothian%20F.C.">Heart of Midlothian</a>, and their 21st consecutive season in the <a href="Scottish%20football%20league%20system">top level of Scottish football</a>, competing in the <a href="Scottish%20Premier%20League">Scottish Premier League</a>. Hearts also competed in the <a href="2003%E2%80%9304%20UEFA%20Cup">UEFA Cup</a>, <a href="2003%E2%80%9304%20Scottish%20Cup">Scottish Cup</a>, <a href="2003%E2%80%9304%20Scottish%20League%20Cup">League Cup</a> and the <a href="Festival%20Cup">Festival Cup</a>.
